Background:

Originally from the great state of New Jersey, I've spent the last four years working on my undergraduate degree in Aerospace Engineering at Boston University. Through elective courses including product design and inventing I found the entrepreneurial spirit within and am eager to learn more working on a team dedicated to innovation, success, and changing the world. Outside of this, I am a jazz musician and tend to play tenor sax, however I am known to make random appearances with an accordion.
